title: Was the Jinx SFX change intentional?

embed.description: Firecracker Jinx Skin Spotlight on League of Legends PBE Server!Price 1350RP! ➲WTFast,lower your ping and lag! - http://bit.ly/WTFastLoL ►Giveaway for this video is over,winner is contacted! ●LoLeaks App● (Stay up to date with uploads) ►Chrome - http://bit.ly/AppChrome ►Mozilla - http://bit.ly/AppMozilla ★Buy Games or RP Cards - https://www.g2a.com/r/loleaks Firework Jinx coming!

body:
After playing it on PBE and hearing the Sound Effects on the attacks of Firecracker Jinx, I was anxious to buy it on the live server!

However, when I played my first game with the skin, I noticed the SFX on the attacks were the regular SFX for the other skins. Was the change intentional?

replies.body:
Hey there! 

This is actually a bug, and it will be fixed soon! 

I hope that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rhnu9bam,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-11T02:08:41.664+0000)
>
> Hey there! 
> 
> This is actually a bug, and it will be fixed soon! 
> 
> I hope that clears things up!

Great to hear!

It's my favorite skin so thanks~
